scripts.build:circuit:compile: mkdir -p build/circuits && npx circom2 circuits/register.circom --r1cs --wasm --sym -o build/circuits
scripts.build:circuit:export:verificationkey: npx snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/circuits/register_final.zkey build/circuits/register_vk.json
scripts.build:circuit:export:solidityverifier: mkdir -p build/contracts && npx snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/circuits/register_final.zkey contracts/RegisterPlonkVerifier.sol
